verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%>, ye <S%H6510>kine<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, that are in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, which <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, which <S%H7533>crush<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%>, which <S%H559>say<s%> to their <S%H113>masters<s%>, <S%H935>Bring<s%>, and let us <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by his <S%H6944>holiness<s%>, that, lo, the <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon you, that he will take you <S%H5375>away<s%> with <S%H6793>hooks<s%>, and your <S%H319>posterity<s%> with <S%H1729%H5518>fishhooks<s%>.

And ye shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H6556>breaches<s%>, <S%H802>every<s%> cow at that which is before her; and ye shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> them into the <S%H2038>palace<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ <S%H935>Come<s%> to <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, and <S%H6586>transgress<s%>; at <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H6586>transgression<s%>; and <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and your <S%H4643>tithes<s%> after <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>years<s%>:

And <S%H6999>offer<s%> a sacrifice of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven<s%>, and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> the free <S%H5071>offerings<s%>: for <S%H3651>this<s%> <S%H157>liketh<s%> you, O ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

¶ And I also have <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H5356>cleanness<s%> of <S%H8127>teeth<s%> in all your <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and <S%H2640>want<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in all your <S%H4725>places<s%>: yet have ye not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And also I have <S%H4513>withholden<s%> the <S%H1653>rain<s%> from you, when there were yet <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> to the <S%H7105>harvest<s%>: and I caused it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and caused it not to <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2513>piece<s%> was <S%H4305>rained<s%> upon, and the <S%H2513>piece<s%> whereupon it <S%H4305>rained<s%> not <S%H3001>withered<s%>.

So <S%H8147>two<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5128>wandered<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>; but they were not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>: yet have ye not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

I have <S%H5221>smitten<s%> you with <S%H7711>blasting<s%> and <S%H3420>mildew<s%>: when your <S%H1593>gardens<s%> and your <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and your fig <S%H8384>trees<s%> and your olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> <S%H7235>increased<s%>, the <S%H1501>palmerworm<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> them: yet have ye not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> among you the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: your young <S%H970>men<s%> have I <S%H2026>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and have taken <S%H7628>away<s%> your <S%H5483>horses<s%>; and I have made the <S%H889>stink<s%> of your <S%H4264>camps<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> unto your <S%H639>nostrils<s%>: yet have ye not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

I have <S%H2015>overthrown<s%> some of you, as <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4114>overthrew<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, and ye were as a <S%H181>firebrand<s%> plucked <S%H5337>out<s%> of the <S%H8316>burning<s%>: yet have ye not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Therefore thus will I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H6118>because<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> this unto thee, <S%H3559>prepare<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For, lo, he that <S%H3335>formeth<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H1254>createth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and <S%H5046>declareth<s%> unto <S%H120>man<s%> what is his <S%H7808>thought<s%>, that <S%H6213>maketh<s%> the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H5890>darkness<s%>, and <S%H1869>treadeth<s%> upon the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.
